meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unpalatable.
meanings.sent1: The unpalatabilities of the dish made it hard to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The unpalatabilities of the food were evident from the first bite.
meanings.sent3: Despite their unpalatabilities, the vegetables tried to be appealing.
meanings.sent4: The unpalatabilities of the situation left a bitter taste in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The unpalatabilities of the medicine lingered unpleasantly.

meanings.sent1: She couldn't ignore the unpalatabilities of the meal.
meanings.sent2: The unpalatabilities on the plate were too much to bear.
meanings.sent3: The unpalatabilities in the recipe surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unpalatabilities of the drink were like a sour surprise.
meanings.sent5: The unpalatabilities of the dish were impossible to overlook.
